TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphTypeface extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 指定與磁碟上字型檔對應的實體字型。

span.span: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件是對應至單一字體的字型系列表示的 OpenType 字型檔案，或是序列化為的文件中的記憶體區塊的低層級的文字物件。The object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document. 正確要用於測試回合中指定的邏輯字型的字元通常取決於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字型系統和記錄所產生的物件物件，並格式化文字的行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。The correct to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the objects generated by the object and line formatting text [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. 提供屬性和方法：The provides properties and methods for: - 取得字型臉部的常用度量，例如上升和下降到 em 大小的比例。Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size. - 取得度量、 外框輪廓，以及個別字符的點陣圖。Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs. - 文件中的序列化。Serialization in a document. 下列清單描述類型的應用程式案例，說明使用低層級的值會控制，物件提供。The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the object provides. - 固定的格式文件產生器可能會使用內嵌在文件容器中取得字型的二進位映像A fixed format document generator may use the to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container - 印表機驅動程式可使用取得字型的字符外框或點陣圖或整個字型映像傳送至印表機。A printer driver may use the to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer. - A檢視器應用程式可能使用取得計量和點陣圖的資訊。A viewer application may use the to obtain metric and bitmap information. 每個字符都會定義度量，以指定與其他的對齊方式。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 下圖定義圖像 （glyph） 字元的度量值。The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters. ![作圖器字符測量](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "作圖器字符度量")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 字符字元的度量值Metric values of glyph characters

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.

summary.span: 使用指定的字型檔位置，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`. 建構物件不要使用樣式模擬。The constructed object does not use style simulations. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的新執行個體藉由指定的字型檔位置的類別。The following example shows how to create a new instance of the class by specifying a font file location. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet1)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri typefaceSource, valuetype System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations styleSimulations) cil managed

One of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的字型檔位置和 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`和`styleSimulations`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.

span.span: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，包含表示距離資訊的索引鍵/值組。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 這個值是表示距離的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遞增寬度] 和 [字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內的黑色方塊下邊緣時，值為正數。The value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 字型儲存格的高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 黑色方塊的下邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形時，值為負數。The value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FaceNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FaceNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字型 (以 物件表示) 的 Win32 字體名稱。

span.span: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，包含表示 Win32 字體名稱資訊的索引鍵值組。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.

value.span: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 物件。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 這個值是表示 Win32 字體名稱的字串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字型未提供指定之語言的名稱，它會傳回英文的字體名稱。If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English. Win32 字體名稱 （而不是一般或粗體顯示） 的加權和/或樣式，來識別，但不是會識別 stretch 或其他權數。The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FamilyNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FamilyNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字型 (以 物件表示) 的 Win32 系列名稱。

span.span: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，包含表示 Win32 系列名稱資訊的索引鍵值組。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.

value.span: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 物件。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 這個值是表示 Win32 系列名稱的字串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字型不提供指定的語言輸入姓氏屬性會傳回英文的系列名稱。If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the property returns the family name in English. Win32 系列名稱不包括定期或粗體的加權和樣式，但包含其他的粗細和自動縮放。The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
